Text: What is the source material? If it's DVD, then the source is pixelated 720x480 MPEG2 VOB, and upsampling it to 720p merely result in an extra 20gigs of bloat.

This is a great torrent, I highly reccomend it. It is in a square shape but when I fullscreen it with WMP it looks just fine. Might take a while to download because of the file size but it is definitely worth it, every single episode plus extras in good quality!
